channel.title: statistics on Welcome
channel.description: Recent content in statistics on Welcome

item.title: introduction to hypothesis testing
item.description: There’s two main branches of statistics. One, where we collect and summarize the data we have. Other where we infer stuff about a population based on some sample data we collect. Hypothesis testing is one way to make that inference and so it is called inferential statistics. It can be confusing because there are endless terminilogies and rules to keep in mind but we can tackle it by breaking it down into smaller parts.
